import React, {useState} from 'react' import SyllableCount from './SyllableCount' export default function EnglishForm () { const [LineData, setLineData] = useState({ firstLine:'', secondLine:'', thirdLine:'', }) function handleChange (event) { const {name, value} = event.target setLineData({...LineData, [name]: value}) } console.log(SyllableCount(LineData.firstLine) ) return(



) }
